    • Field Detail

      • isHit

        public boolean isHit

      • destructionStatus

        public int destructionStatus
        Status represented how much the BrickTile is destroyed. Status is -1 if BrickTile has not been destroyed

      • counter

        public int counter

    • Constructor Detail

      • BrickTile

        public BrickTile(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,processing.core.PImage> sprites,
                 int x,
                 int y,
                 int row,
                 int column)
        Constructor method for BrickTile
        Parameters:
        sprites - all images for BrickTile, containing the normal and destroyed BrickTile images
        x - x-coordinate on the window
        y - y-coordinate on the window
        row - row number on window grid
        column - column number on window grid

    • Method Detail

      • hit

        public boolean hit()
        Starts destruction sequence of BrickTile once hit by a fireball
        Overrides:
        hit in class Tile
        Returns:
        true if trigger hit sequence

      • increaseDestructionStatus

        public void increaseDestructionStatus()
        Change the sprite of the BrickTile depending on its destruction status

      • decreaseCounter

        public void decreaseCounter()
        Decreases counter for current destruction status

      • resetCounter

        public void resetCounter()
        Resets counter after changing destruction status

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Checks if BrickTile is hit and runs the destruction sequence. Removes BrickTile once it is fully destroyed.
